entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
